title: Rule 13: Rights of Data Principals (Operational Details)
description: Rule 13 explains how the rights of individuals, known as Data Principals, are to be exercised in practice. While the Act already grants these rights, the Rule provides clarity on the process and obligations of organizations when such requests are made.
